title: Ep. 143 - The Secret to Analyzing Small Cap Stocks
itunes:title: The Secret to Analyzing Small Cap Stocks
description: Frank teaches investors how to analyze small-cap stocks.  He uses fundamental, technical and macro analysis to determine which stocks make it into his Small-Stock Specialist newsletter.  Ed Easterling, author and founder of Crestmont Research, talks about portfolio management and why investors should be careful holding stocks for the long-term.
